name: Adam Rodger
body:
.Net developer living and working in Manchester, United Kingdom.

**Tech:** C#, WCF, SQL Server, Ninject, Moq, NUnit, AutoFixture, FluentAssertions, Wonderware Archestra, Git, Jenkins, Sonar, StyleCop, ReSharper, Rake with Albacore

Focus on automated testing, design patterns, beautiful code and helping others to develop their skill set.

Feel free to send me a message through my GitHub profile.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
